medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening right lower quadrant pain for 4 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain initially started in the mid epigastric region and then moved to the right lower quadrant. Associated symptoms include minor nausea and decreased appetite. No fevers or chills, vomiting, hematemesis, melena, or bright red blood per rectum noted.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal uncle has depression; mother has depression and anxiety.
